supportsStreaming

public boolean supportsStreaming()
Description copied from interface: DOMParser
Indicates if the implementation supports streaming of documents. That is if the implementation can parse a stream of documents from one input source, or if we need to provide a new input source for each call to parse.

Specified by:
supportsStreaming in interface DOMParser
